snippet: A computer crime expert, Mr. Schmidt was recruited by Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama and drafted safeguards that were approved by Congress....

headline.main: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship
headline.print_headline: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship

lead_paragraph: A computer crime expert, Mr. Schmidt was recruited by Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama and drafted safeguards that were approved by Congress.
